entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.2.3
entry.content:
🥳 New Features 🎉

🔄 Okta directory synchronization – Defguard can now synchronize users and groups (directory synchronization) based on their status in Okta

👥 The limit of maximum users and groups that can be synchronized by the directory synchronization was increased in all providers to 10000.

🪲 Fixes

✉️ Allow using SMTP servers without authentication

⚙️ Fixed an issue with users disabled by directory synchronization not being instantly removed from the VPN network

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.3.0
entry.content:
This is a major release of defguard with some key and long awaited functionalities 🙌

🥳 New Features 🎉

🚫 Access Control / Firewall management - ACLs are for now only available for Linux based Defguard Gateway - FreeBSD/OPNSense will come in 1.3.1 stable release.

👥 LDAP & Active Directory two-way synchronization

🐞Bugfixes 🐛

👥 Microsoft / Entra group synchronization fixesby @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1011

🦔 Fix enrollment styling and missing text by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1064

🧑‍💻 De-spam logs, add instrument macro to some high level functions by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1122

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.2.4...v1.3.0

entry.title: New release for DefGuard: v1.4.0
entry.content:
🥳 New Features 🎉

Activity Log https://docs.defguard.net/admin-and-features/features-and-configuration/activity-log

Locations overview index page by @filipslezaklab in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1151

Activity Log Streaming https://docs.defguard.net/enterprise/all-enteprise-features/activity-log-streaming

Terraform AWS deployment https://docs.defguard.net/admin-and-features/setting-up-your-instance/terraform

Dual-stack VPN support #1000

🐞Bugfixes and improvements 🐛

  • Add CI security audits by @j-chmielewski in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1159
  • Rewrite IP address and port ranges by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1161
  • Allow initialising more than one VPN location using a command by @t-aleksander in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1164
  • Switch main crate to virtual workspace by @wojcik91 in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1163
  • Fix e2e tests by @j-chmielewski in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1172
  • Put web UI in a separate crate by @wojcik91 in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1183
  • Polish ACL by @moubctez in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1191
  • Make Activity Log naming consistent by @wojcik91 in https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/pull/1226

Full Changelog: https://github.com/DefGuard/defguard/compare/v1.3.1...v1.4.0
